title: Kerala: land of lagoons
creator_credit: Mohan Wadhwani, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India
brief_description: Surveys the scenic beauty of the southwestern Indian state of Kerala and the colorful festivities observed by its people. Includes scene of the celebration of Onam, an old festival of Kerala, a boat race on Periyar Lake, a temple festival, and the famous dance-drama Kathakali.
creator_credit_for_label: Mohan Wadhwani, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India
